Title: The 1936 meeting of Zhu De and Living Buddha Geda
Designer: Renzhen Langjia (仁真朗加)Nima Zeren (尼玛泽仁)Yixi Zeren (益西泽仁)Mei Dingkai (梅定开)Chen Bingxi (陈秉玺)Da Wa (达娃)Yixi Sangdan (益西桑丹)Lü Shumin (吕树民)
Publisher: Sichuan minzu chubanshe (四川民族出版社)
Notes: The meeting took place at the Beri Monastery (Beri Gonpa).
